evidence.claim: Aloha utilizes AWS services for its infrastructure including Lambda and S3.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations for handling sensitive health information.
Aloha supports HL7 FHIR standards for healthcare data interoperability.
Uses X12 for electronic data interchange in healthcare transactions.
Integration is facilitated through RESTful APIs and webhooks.

icp.icp_reason: Aloha utilizes X12 transactions and supports HIPAA compliance, aligning with ICP criteria.
